title: How Long does it take to reach level 7 on the boards.
body:
I rarely come to the boards, now after being gone about a year I find its, got this weird level requirment to it.  Look I'm looking for a simple answer to a theory craft build on Urgot. I need to know if his W (purge) applies all onhit effects. AKA fevor {{item:3147}} {{item:3124}} {{item:3042}} {{item:3153}}

Since your incline to keep me from posting on the main boards I feel its only right you take responciblity and answer it yourself.

replies.body:
^ this right here. Sometimes you just need a quick boards profile sync to make sure your level updates correctly with your Summoner Level. You can also use the syncing tool Kushabolic linked.

You should be able to post this question over in Gameplay now after this post synced your levels.
